description.zh-cn: 中国历史上承南北朝、下启唐朝的朝代，结束了长期的分裂局面，重新建立了大一统的国家。
description.en: A Chinese dynasty that succeeded the Northern and Southern dynasties and preceded the Tang dynasty, ending a long period of division and re-establishing a unified state.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝的开国皇帝，通过禅让取代北周，统一中国，开创了开皇之治。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Sui dynasty, who replaced the Northern Zhou through abdication, unified China, and initiated the Reign of Kaihuang.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的北朝之一，最后被杨坚所篡建立隋朝。
description.en: One of the Northern dynasties during the Northern and Southern dynasties period in China, eventually usurped by Yang Jian who established the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 北周最后一位皇帝，禅位于杨坚。
description.en: The last emperor of the Northern Zhou dynasty, who abdicated the throne to Yang Jian.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝第二位皇帝，隋文帝杨坚次子。在位期间兴建大运河、东征高句丽，最终引发隋末民变。
description.en: The second emperor of the Sui dynasty, second son of Emperor Wen Yang Jian. During his reign, he constructed the Grand Canal and launched eastern expeditions against Goguryeo, which ultimately led to the rebellions at the end of the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 隋末唐初的群雄之一，在洛阳废隋恭帝杨侗自立，建国号郑。
description.en: One of the warlords during the late Sui and early Tang dynasties. He deposed Emperor Gong Yang Tong in Luoyang, established himself as emperor, and founded the state of Zheng.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝之孙，隋炀帝死后在洛阳被王世充等拥立为帝，后被王世充所废杀。
description.en: Grandson of Emperor Yang of Sui. After Emperor Yang's death, he was enthroned in Luoyang by Wang Shichong and others, but was later deposed and killed by Wang Shichong.

description.zh-cn: 继隋朝之后的大一统中原王朝，与隋朝合称“隋唐”。
description.en: The unified Chinese dynasty that followed the Sui dynasty, often referred to together as the 'Sui-Tang' period.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝的开国皇帝，隋末时于晋阳起兵，攻入长安，废隋恭帝杨侑后称帝。
description.en: The founding emperor of the Tang dynasty. He rebelled in Jinyang during the late Sui, captured Chang'an, and proclaimed himself emperor after deposing Emperor Gong Yang You.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝之孙，李渊攻入长安后被拥立为帝，后禅位于李渊。
description.en: Grandson of Emperor Yang of Sui. He was enthroned by Li Yuan after the capture of Chang'an and later abdicated the throne to him.

en: Sui's conquest of the Chen dynasty

description.zh-cn: 隋朝发动的统一战争，灭亡了南方的陈朝，结束了中国长达近三百年的南北分裂局面。
description.en: A unification war launched by the Sui dynasty that conquered the Chen dynasty in the south, ending nearly 300 years of north-south division in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国南北朝时期的南朝最后一个朝代，被隋朝所灭。
description.en: The last of the Southern Dynasties during the Northern and Southern Dynasties period in China, conquered by the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝杨坚在位期间出现的政治稳定、社会经济繁荣的时期。
description.en: A period of political stability and socioeconomic prosperity during the reign of Emperor Wen of Sui (Yang Jian).

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝长子，原为太子，后被废黜并被其弟杨广所杀。
description.en: The eldest son of Emperor Wen of Sui, originally the crown prince, he was later deposed and killed by his younger brother Yang Guang.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝权臣，帮助杨广夺取太子之位。
description.en: A powerful official of the Sui dynasty who helped Yang Guang secure the position of crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝对高句丽发动的四次大规模战争，严重消耗了隋朝国力，是导致隋末民变的主要原因之一。
description.en: Four large-scale wars launched by the Sui dynasty against Goguryeo, which severely depleted Sui's national strength and was one of the main causes of the rebellions at the end of the dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 位于东北亚的古代王国，曾与隋朝发生多次大规模战争。
description.en: An ancient kingdom in Northeast Asia that engaged in several large-scale wars with the Sui dynasty.

en: Rebellions at the end of the Sui dynasty

description.zh-cn: 隋朝末年由于隋炀帝的暴政，特别是东征高句丽的巨大消耗，引发的全国性大规模民变和割据，最终导致隋朝灭亡。
description.en: Widespread rebellions and warlordism across China in the late Sui dynasty, caused by the tyranny of Emperor Yang, especially the immense costs of the Goguryeo campaigns, which ultimately led to the collapse of the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝将领，在江都发动兵变，弑杀隋炀帝，后自立为帝，国号许。
description.en: A Sui dynasty general who launched a coup in Jiangdu, assassinated Emperor Yang, and later declared himself emperor of the state of Xu.

en: Three Departments and Six Ministries system

description.zh-cn: 隋朝确立的中央官制，将相权一分为三，互相牵制，以巩固皇权，对后世影响深远。
description.en: A central government structure established by the Sui dynasty, which divided the power of the chancellor into three, creating checks and balances to consolidate imperial authority, profoundly influencing later dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝创立的通过考试选拔官员的制度，打破了世族对官职的垄断，对后世选官制度影响深远。
description.en: A system for selecting officials through examinations established in the Sui dynasty, which broke the aristocratic monopoly on official positions and had a profound impact on later official selection systems.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝时期兴建的贯通南北的大型水利工程，连接了中国五大水系，促进了南北经济文化交流。
description.en: A large-scale water conservancy project built during the Sui dynasty that connected north and south China, linking the country's five major river systems and promoting economic and cultural exchange.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝的首都，由宇文恺设计，是当时世界上规模最大的城市之一，其规划对后世及东亚都市规划有深刻影响。
description.en: The capital of the Sui dynasty, designed by Yuwen Kai. It was one of the largest cities in the world at the time, and its layout had a profound influence on later and East Asian urban planning.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝著名建筑家，主持设计了隋都大兴城和东都洛阳城，并参与了广通渠的建设。
description.en: A famous architect of the Sui dynasty who led the design of the Sui capital Daxingcheng and the eastern capital Luoyang, and also participated in the construction of the Guangtong Canal.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝工匠，设计和修建了著名的赵州桥（安济桥）。
description.en: A craftsman of the Sui dynasty who designed and built the famous Zhaozhou Bridge (Anji Bridge).

description.zh-cn: 由李春在隋朝修建的石拱桥，是世界上现存最古老、跨度最大、保存最完整的单孔坦弧敞肩石拱桥。
description.en: A stone arch bridge built by Li Chun during the Sui dynasty. It is the world's oldest, largest-span, and best-preserved open-spandrel segmental stone arch bridge.

description.zh-cn: 突厥汗国分裂后形成的主要部分之一，与隋朝时而战争时而臣服。隋末时支持地方割据势力。
description.en: One of the main parts formed after the split of the Turkic Khaganate. It engaged in both conflict and vassalage with the Sui dynasty. It supported local warlords at the end of the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝之孙，隋亡后被东突厥立为隋王。
description.en: Grandson of Emperor Yang of Sui. After the fall of the Sui dynasty, he was installed as the King of Sui by the Eastern Turks.

description.zh-cn: 杨坚接受北周静帝禅让，建立隋朝，是为隋文帝。
description.en: Yang Jian accepted the abdication of Emperor Jing of Northern Zhou and established the Sui dynasty, becoming Emperor Wen of Sui.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝的建立取代了北周。
description.en: The establishment of the Sui dynasty replaced the Northern Zhou.

description.zh-cn: 周静帝禅位于杨坚，使其得以建立隋朝。
description.en: Emperor Jing of Northern Zhou abdicated the throne to Yang Jian, enabling him to establish the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝发动了灭亡陈朝的统一战争。
description.en: The Sui dynasty launched a war of unification to conquer the Chen dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 隋灭陈之战导致了陈朝的灭亡，隋朝统一中国。
description.en: The war led to the fall of the Chen dynasty and the unification of China by the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 杨广据传在仁寿宫发动兵变，导致其父隋文帝杨坚突然去世，随后杨广即位。
description.en: Yang Guang allegedly launched a coup at Renshou Palace, leading to the sudden death of his father, Emperor Wen Yang Jian, after which Yang Guang ascended the throne.

description.zh-cn: 杨广与兄长杨勇争夺太子之位，最终成功废黜并杀害了杨勇。
description.en: Yang Guang contended with his elder brother Yang Yong for the position of crown prince, eventually succeeding in deposing and killing him.

description.zh-cn: 杨素与杨广合谋，帮助杨广揭露杨勇的过失，使其成功夺得太子之位。
description.en: Yang Su conspired with Yang Guang, helping him expose Yang Yong's faults and successfully secure the position of crown prince.

description.zh-cn: 隋文帝杨坚通过一系列改革措施，开创了政治稳定、经济繁荣的开皇之治。
description.en: Through a series of reforms, Emperor Wen Yang Jian initiated the Reign of Kaihuang, a period of political stability and economic prosperity.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝大规模兴建并连接运河，形成了贯通南北的隋唐大运河。
description.en: Emperor Yang of Sui undertook the large-scale construction and connection of canals, forming the Sui-Tang Grand Canal that ran from north to south.

description.zh-cn: 隋炀帝三次发动对高句丽的大规模征讨。
description.en: Emperor Yang of Sui launched three large-scale military expeditions against Goguryeo.

description.zh-cn: 对高句丽的战争造成了巨大的人力物力消耗，加重了人民负担，是引发隋末民变的主要原因之一。
description.en: The wars against Goguryeo caused immense consumption of human and material resources, increasing the burden on the people, and was one of the main causes of the rebellions at the end of the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 全国范围的民变与群雄割据最终导致了隋朝的灭亡。
description.en: The nationwide rebellions and warlordism ultimately led to the collapse of the Sui dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 宇文化及在江都发动兵变，弑杀隋炀帝杨广。
description.en: Yuwen Huaji launched a coup in Jiangdu and assassinated Emperor Yang of Sui, Yang Guang.

description.zh-cn: 李渊在长安接受隋恭帝杨侑禅让，建立唐朝。
description.en: Li Yuan accepted the abdication of Emperor Gong Yang You in Chang'an and established the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 唐朝的建立标志着以长安为中心的隋朝正统的终结。
description.en: The establishment of the Tang dynasty marked the end of the legitimate Sui dynasty centered in Chang'an.

description.zh-cn: 隋恭帝杨侑禅位于李渊，使其合法地建立唐朝。
description.en: Emperor Gong Yang You abdicated the throne to Li Yuan, allowing him to legitimately establish the Tang dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 王世充废黜在洛阳的隋恭帝杨侗，并于不久后将其杀害。
description.en: Wang Shichong deposed Emperor Gong Yang Tong in Luoyang and had him killed shortly thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝正式确立了三省六部制，成为后世中央行政体系的范本。
description.en: The Sui dynasty formally established the Three Departments and Six Ministries system, which became a model for the central administrative system of later dynasties.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝创立了科举制度，通过考试选拔人才，打破了世族垄断。
description.en: The Sui dynasty created the imperial examination system, selecting talent through tests and breaking the aristocratic monopoly.

description.zh-cn: 宇文恺奉隋文帝之命，负责设计和建造了隋朝的新都大兴城。
description.en: Under the order of Emperor Wen of Sui, Yuwen Kai was responsible for the design and construction of the new Sui capital, Daxingcheng.

description.zh-cn: 李春设计并修建了赵州桥，这是中国建筑史上的重大成就。
description.en: Li Chun designed and built the Zhaozhou Bridge, a major achievement in the history of Chinese architecture.

description.zh-cn: 隋朝灭亡后，东突厥处罗可汗立隋炀帝之孙杨政道为隋王，作为延续隋朝的象征。
description.en: After the fall of the Sui dynasty, Chuluo Khan of the Eastern Turks installed Yang Zhengdao, a grandson of Emperor Yang of Sui, as the King of Sui, as a symbol of the continuation of the dynasty.
